name: Discover the heritage city
description: It is called that Hue is the capital ancient city in Viet Nam and this place is well-known as one of the attractive destinations in S-shape country. There're many famous landscapes including The Citadel, which is place that the Nguyen Dynasty and his Royal Family lived; Thien Mu pagoda, a spiritual place for both visitors and Buddhist People. In addition, Kings'Tombs, which insist of Tu Duc, Khai Dinh, Minh Mang, are also  places that any tourists need to pay attention to when visiting Hue. All make Hue City become more beautiful, pretty and ancient. What will be a pity if anyone comes here without stopping his feet.
